    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterFilter getClusterFilter()
      Return the ClusterListener associated to this ClusterListener.
      A null values means no filtering
      void handleCluster(ZigBeeEndpoint endpoint, ClusterMessage clusterMessage)
      The callback invoked by the ZigBee Base Driver to announce for a new ClusterMessage
      void setClusterFilter(ClusterFilter filter)
      Set the ClusterListener of this ClusterListener.
      A null values means no filtering

    • Method Detail

      • setClusterFilter

        void setClusterFilter(ClusterFilter filter)
        Set the ClusterListener of this ClusterListener.
        A null values means no filtering
        Parameters:
        filter - the ClusterListener to associates to this ClusterListener.
        null to disable the filtering
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • getClusterFilter

        ClusterFilter getClusterFilter()
        Return the ClusterListener associated to this ClusterListener.
        A null values means no filtering
        Returns:
        the ClusterListener associated to this ClusterListener
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • handleCluster

        void handleCluster(ZigBeeEndpoint endpoint,
                 ClusterMessage clusterMessage)
        The callback invoked by the ZigBee Base Driver to announce for a new ClusterMessage
        Parameters:
        endpoint - reference to the ZigBeeEndpoint receiving the ClusterMessage
        clusterMessage - reference to the received ClusterMessage
